scripts.deploy: vite build && cp dist/index.html dist/404.html && gh-pages -d dist --cname koob.oolumomi.dev -b gh-pages --repo https://github.com/scientist-Momi/koob_frontend.git
scripts.deploy1: vite build && cp dist/index.html dist/404.html && gh-pages -d dist -m 'Deploy update' --cname koob.oolumomi.dev
scripts.deploy3: vite build && cp dist/index.html dist/404.html && gh-pages -d dist --cname koob.oolumomi.dev
